striking.description: A focused, piercing strike (e.g., Rapier point, Spear tip, Dagger).

slash_slicing.description: A wide, tearing cut (e.g., Sword, Axe, Scythe).

piercing.description: A narrow, deep puncture (e.g., Arrow, Bolt, Dart).

blunt_crushing.description: Force applied over a broad area (e.g., Mace, Hammer, Flail).

burning.effect: damage over time; reduces healing received.

chilled.effect: reduces SPD and DEX; 10% chance to be frozen.

shocked.effect: reduces Initiative (SPD) and 10% chance to be stunned.

slowed.effect: reduces Movement Speed and grants AC bonus to targets.

confused.effect: target may attack randomly or pass turn.

bleeding.effect: damage over time; based on target's max HP.

sleep.effect: target is inactive until damaged or duration expires.

paralyzed.effect: target is unable to act; physical damage vs. paralyzed targets is critical.

area_effect.description: Spell affects a radius rather than a single target.

damage_over_time.description: Damage is dealt in ticks over a specified duration (e.g., 3 turns).

critical_hits.description: Damage is multiplied based on class/skill (base x2.0).

instantaneous.description: Damage is dealt immediately in one instance.

multi_hit.description: Ability strikes the target multiple times in one action.
